featured.text: Mr. Liu: Well, I wish I agree with you, but I don’t.
Dr. Liu’s new book is a collection of his _____ of the daily life of tribal people in Africa.

definition.zh_def: 流動或流出，通常指液體或氣體的運動。
definition.en_def: To flow or to move in a steady stream, often referring to liquids or gases.
definition.example: The river began to liu rapidly after the heavy rain.
